summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 273 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1854 m), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 273.0m lower than yesterday, 795.1m lower than the past week, 1854.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 794.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1589.1m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air moisture should feel ok and near calm conditions. Some rain can be expected, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
